title: HOUR 2 - Lakers
itunes:title: HOUR 2 - Lakers
description:
Doug talks about the Lakers, the Clippers, and staying relevant in Los Angeles. FSR NFL insider Adam Caplan joins the show, and the Dodgers are the first in MLB to 90 wins.

#douggottliebshow
